text: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
author: Maya Angelou

text: Reading is that fruitful miracle of a communication in the midst of solitude.
author: Proust-M

text: The man who reads nothing at all is better educated than the man who reads nothing but newspapers.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: We write to taste life twice, in the moment and in retrospect.
author: Anais Nin

text: Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it.
author: Lloyd Alexander

text: The scariest moment is always just before you start.
author: Stephen King
